summary: "Skyfall" is a 2012 spy movie, the 23rd in the James Bond series. Daniel Craig plays Bond, investigating data leaks and attacks on MI6, led by the villain Raoul Silva, played by Javier Bardem. Judi Dench returns as M. The film introduces new characters and revisits old ones, like Miss Moneypenny and Q. Directed by Sam Mendes, it faced production challenges due to MGM's bankruptcy but ultimately succeeded. It premiered in October 2012 and was a critical and commercial hit, earning over $1 billion worldwide and setting records for the franchise and MGM.
title: Skyfall
